courses.title: Configuring Terminal Session Recording
courses.description: Keep track of what is happening on your systems by using Terminal Session Recording to record and review terminal sessions of users and administrators.

courses.title: Reducing unplanned maintenance with Kernel Live Patching
courses.description: Resolve Critical Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs) by applying Kernel Live Patches to your systems without needing to take a system downtime for maintenance.

courses.title: Managing software from an application stream
courses.description: Learn how to choose versions of popular and supported open source languages and offer them to users through an application stream.

courses.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux with SQL Server Columnstores
courses.description: Improve SQL Server performance by using Red Hat Enterprise Linux performance tools and SQL Server Columnstores.

courses.title: Deploying containers using Container Tools [podman]
courses.description: Explore how Podman helps you run workloads in containers by taking an existing container image and deploying it into a runtime environment.

courses.title: Performance observability in practice with bcc-tools
courses.description: Collect data on various system activities, such as disk performance, latency, and more using the bcc-tools.  This data can help identify issues with application performance.

courses.title: Using Web Console to build virtual machine images
courses.description: Learn how to manage virtual machines produced for different providers through a single, Web Console included application.

courses.title: Creating images with Container Tools [buildah]
courses.description: Try different methods to build an application container, modify an existing container image and build one from scratch using the Container Tool buildah.

courses.title: Managing system updates using the web console
courses.description: Explore how someone with limited Linux experience can apply system updates to Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems through this user friendly web interface.

courses.title: Configuring the system-wide cryptographic policy
courses.description: Enforce more complex ciphers, protocol versions, and usable ciphers across all services running on your machines.

courses.title: Reducing Operational and Storage Costs with Virtual Data Optimizer (VDO)
courses.description: Explore how Virtual Data Optimizer (VDO) can reduce the amount of disk space files use, allowing you to save on storage costs.

courses.title: Stratis, a new Red Hat Enterprise Linux storage technology
courses.description: Get started with Stratis, a pool-based storage technology included with Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
